Name: Ruins
About the game: Run, jump, and teleport your way through a mysterious landscape where nothing is as it seems. Meet all the creatures of the land and learn their story. Help change the world and its future. You play as Timo, a curious boy, who wakes from a strange dream with some bizarre instructions. He will be given three objects that hold great importance. And maybe find what he have lost in the past. Over 70 NPCs to meet Large open world for you to explore 7 unique merchandise to master Ruins is a retro adventure game, as they were made 20 years ago. The game features many different mechanics, such as teleporting, controlling different machines with different controls, shooting, speedrunning challenges, environmental puzzles and more. Ruins rewards exploration and is a open world game, with over 70 NPCs for you to meet and learn from. Each has their own information that can help you along your journey. The game does not hold your hand and is made for players that miss that from the games back in the day.
